metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3609 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: .A flaw was found in the CAN BCM networking protocol in the Linux kernel,where a local attacker can abuse a flaw in the CAN subsystem to corruptmemory, crash the system or escalate privileges. This race condition innet/can/bcm.c in the Linux kernel allows for local privilege escalation toroot.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
